title: 5.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
Secret message

Rick and Tina formed a secret detective club. Rick wants to send a secret message to Tina about an investigation clue. The clue is Buckingham Palace. Help Rick by encoding the clue using the Pigpen Cipher.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
